rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0001
rows.name:
I don't know what I was expecting in
here but this jolly well isn't it.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0002
rows.name: Tora surprised too!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0003
rows.name:
Insides of World Tree make Tora's
head go all swirly-whirly!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0004
rows.name:
When it's even getting to Tora,
you know it's serious business!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0005
rows.name:
No need for surprise.
Masterpon lacking in many regards.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0006
rows.name:
In particular, common sense level
close to 0%.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0007
rows.name:
Er, Hana!
It go without saying, but Blade
should not diss Masterpon!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0008
rows.name:
Hana get very impudent since
activating JD mode...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0009
rows.name: She is a troublesome girl!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0010
rows.name:
Troublesome?
Didn't you make her, though?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0011
rows.name:
Yes, in manner of speaking, but Hana
is result of work of three generations.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0012
rows.name:
Actually, there plenty in Hana
that Tora not know or understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0013
rows.name:
Hana's body is filled
with the desires of three men...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0014
rows.name:
Desires of Professor Senzo,
Professor Tatezo and Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0015
rows.name:
It would not be strange if
I start overflowing at any moment!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0016
rows.name:
Hana, I think the way you are wording it
makes it sound extremely wrong...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0017
rows.name: So, hey, Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0018
rows.name:
Does that mean even you don't know
everything she's capable of?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0019
rows.name: That right.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0020
rows.name:
Basis of mode change function was
laid down by Grampypon Senzo.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0021
rows.name:
So part of system core is sealed
mystery, or "black box".

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0022
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0023
rows.name: Can't you, like, investigate?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0024
rows.name: Are you also in the dark here, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0101
rows.name:
Unfortunately no. Even Dadapon not
able to fathom what going on in there.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0102
rows.name:
That because the box have
note on it saying "Do not open!"

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0103
rows.name: The...box?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0104
rows.name:
I thought "black box" was some kind of
fancy engineer term or something!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0105
rows.name: You want to see?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0106
rows.name:
So, the box is in Hana's stomach or
something?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0107
rows.name: Why don't we open it and see?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0108
rows.name:
No way! That might activate self-
destruct mode of Hana!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0109
rows.name: S-self-destruct?!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0110
rows.name: You can actually do that?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0111
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0112
rows.name:
Grampypon thought self-destruct was
hero's most daring and noble act.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0113
rows.name: So...best not tamper.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0114
rows.name:
Your Grampypon had some very
strange ideas, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0115
rows.name: Are you okay with that, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0116
rows.name:
Having a bloody great bomb in
your stomach, I mean!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0117
rows.name: Oh yes. No problem.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0118
rows.name:
Bomb is comparatively safe next
to Hana's other functions.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0121
rows.name:
Meh?
What happen?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0122
rows.name: Zeke? Masterpon?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0123
rows.name:
Why you suddenly make
selves far from Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0201
rows.name: In the dark about functions?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0202
rows.name:
Right. Sure you've not got any hidden
abilities kicking about in there?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0203
rows.name: Let me see...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0204
rows.name: Function identified!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0205
rows.name: Oh, excellent! Let's see it, then!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0206
rows.name: Hana feels moe-moe for Zeke-wan!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0207
rows.name:
Hey, hey Zeke? Can you please
spoil Hana a little more-wan?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0208
rows.name: What's going on?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0209
rows.name:
It is Hana hidden mode,
dog-eared beast version mode!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0210
rows.name:
Hana! That mode should be
used only for Masterpon!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0211
rows.name:
I also told you to seal it forever
because people would question it!

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0212
rows.name:
Yeah...That sounds like
one of your hobbies...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0213
rows.name:
How honest are you
about your desires...?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0214
rows.name: This is so embarrasing...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0215
rows.name: Anyway, back on topic...

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0216
rows.name:
You don't have any hidden function
we could use for battle or exploring?
Something like that?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0217
rows.name:
Even without Tora, you must be able to
do a bit of digging around in that black
box of yours, no?

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0218
rows.name: Absolutely none.

rows.label: kizunatalk008_msg0219
rows.name: ...Really?!
